```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
```

# Load date

```{r}
# Read in data table (Created by Amna, updated 2020-10-22)
x <- read_xlsx("../data/raw/BeWell-studyid_consentdate.xlsx")

```

# Create vars

```{r}
xm <- 
  x %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  rename(date = "Consent Date") %>%
  arrange(date) %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) %>%
  mutate(n.consented = seq(from = 1, to = nrow(.))) %>%
  mutate(date.num = as.numeric(date)) %>%
  mutate(origin = "data")

head(xm)
```

# Plot

```{r}

xm %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = n.consented)) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth() +
  theme_bw()
```

# Model

```{r}
xm.lo <- loess(formula = n.consented ~ as.numeric(date),
               data = xm,
               control = loess.control(surface = "direct"))

new.data <- data.frame(date = as.numeric(seq.Date(from = Sys.Date(),
                                                  to = as.Date("2021-01-01"), 
                                                  by = "days")
                                         )
                       )
                             
pred <- predict(object = xm.lo, 
                newdata = new.data,
                se = TRUE)

model.out <- data.frame(n.consented = pred$fit,
                        se.fit = pred$se.fit,
                        date = as.Date(new.data$date, 
                                       origin = as.Date("1970-01-01")),
                        origin = "prediction")

head(model.out)
```

# Plot model

```{r}
model.out %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = n.consented)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}
dm <- 
  xm %>%
  bind_rows(model.out)

head(dm)
```

```{r}
dm %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = n.consented)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = origin)) +
  stat_smooth() +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 42, linetype = "dotted", color = "red") +
  geom_vline(xintercept = dm$date[min(grep("^42.", dm$n.consented))],
             linetype = "dotted",
             color = "red") +
  geom_text(x = as.Date("2020-10-10"),
            y = 5,
            label = paste0("Estimated full enrollment on\n", dm$date[min(grep("^42.", dm$n.consented))]))
```

# Time until full enrollment

```{r}
dm$date[min(grep("^42.", dm$n.consented))] - Sys.Date()
```


# Estimated study completion (assuming no holiday breaks)

```{r}
dm$date[min(grep("^42.", dm$n.consented))] + lubridate::weeks(11)
```
